1131321.content:
In the digital world, while most of the older kids were doing their own thing, the two youngest of the group, TK and Kari, were walking along while taking the time to let the sound nature fill their ears and relax.

They of course, were going to go back before it got dark, not wanting to worry their respective older brothers, but they were still digidestined nonetheless.. And if they were ever in a dangerous situation, their Digimon could always come to their aid.

Still, it was nice to get away so they could have some time to explore and just live in the moment without having to worry too much and just be kids..

Speaking kids of being kids, of course...
-

As Kari was walking alongside TK, she reflected on the blonde boy. He certainly was rather friendly and enthusiastic.

Although, he also seemed a bit gullible, and-

Hellooooo...

Kari had gotten a glance of TK's waistband peeking out of his sandy brown shorts.

She stifled the urge to giggle as some gears turned in her head.. Oh yes.. She'd make sure that he learned to pull up his pants.

"Hey TK, I think I spotted something by that tree up ahead!" Kari said to him, point a tree further up and a little off the path they were on.

"Really?" TK said as he turned his head to look at the tree in question, unaware that Kari had stealthily snuck her hands into his shorts without him noticing.
1131321.title: Kari

11313212.content:
Kari took fought the urge to giggle as her fingers slowly gripped TK's waistband..

And proceeded to hike them up the poor unsuspecting boy's behind. The force of the sudden wedgie was enough to not only take TK by surprise, but it lifted him upwards, his feet about two inches off the ground.

"K-Kari, what the-"

"Sorry TK, it's just.." Kari finally let out a playful giggle as she held the boy off the ground, "You really need to wear a belt more often.. Plus you got some cute underpants!"

TK could feel nothing but embarrassment at that..

Well, that, and this sinking feeling that she was only getting started.

11411.content:
(This is drawn based off of the bath scene from ep 8. For regional context, in Japan you do not wear anything into the traditional bath as it is seen as dirtying the water. So it's seen as rude and is breaking the "rules" of a bath house to wear even a towel in)

"This is going to be great!" Tai said excitedly, pulling off his shirt, "We haven't had a bath in a long time!" They had been stuck in this world for days travelling.

It was only through sheer luck they had found the mansion open. Now with the discovery of the bath house rooms, they were ready to relax. Izzy and T.K. had already gone in, leaving Tai, Matt, and Joe in the locker room depositing their stuff. Matt had already stripped down to his white briefs when he notices Joe standing to the side still clothed. "You going to come in or not?" Matt says impatiently.

He was getting tired of the worrywart being so cautious about everything; he was being even worse than Matt was sometimes! If Joe couldn't even get into the bath to relax by himself then Matt was going to force him in whether he liked it or not! Unaware of his friend's thoughts, Joe stutters a bit before answering, "Y-Yeah, of course! I just don't have my trunks or a large towel like I usually do... Guess I'll have to just go in my boxers..." He says with a frown, pulling off his shoes and brown shorts revealing his blue boxers.

Matt looked at the older boy in surprise. The fact is you didn't wear anything into the bath part of a traditional Japanese bathhouse - Joe lived in Japan he should know that! Tai had also stopped, also only in his blue briefs, and was staring at the oblivious Joe as he folded his shorts. "I can't forgive that, guys who guard themselves and dirty the water in an all men's bath." Tai looks over at Matt and makes eye contact smirking.

"Wha-GUYS!" Joe yelps as the two other boys charge him and tackle him. They fight and eventually pin him down, "Alright guys, seriously stop!"

"Get his shirt off Tai!" Matt yells as he struggles to hold the older boy down. Tai succeeds mostly but Joe is making things very difficult for them. Matt growls in frustration before an idea comes to him. He grabs Joe's waistband, "Stop squirming so much or you'll regret it!"
11411.title: Matt Ishida

114111.content:
“MPH-! LEPH-GO!” Joe said, muffled under his shirt and vest, struggling all the harder as he felt Matt’s hand grip his waistband. He had received wedgies often enough to know what came next. Tai hadn’t managed to get the vest and shirt off his head so it was tangled around Joe’s neck and arms, trapping them. He was helpless if he couldn’t roll away.

Matt gritted his teeth; grabbing the waistband left him with one less hand to pin Joe. “Matt!” Tai said as he struggled to keep the thrashing boy pinned, “Just do it!” Matt nodded and his muscles tensed before he yanked quickly and as hard as he could.

Joe’s voice jumped an octave as he girlishly squealed as the seam of his boxers rammed into him, digging deep into his butt as Matt worked the waistband ever higher; “Tai, a little help?” The other boy grabbed the front of Joe’s boxers, causing the seam to now bite viciously into his crotch as well. Joe gasped in pain as they dragged him to his feet, hands in the air and tangled in his shirt as they do it, whimpering as he felt the breeze around his exposed butt as the cotton jams deeply up his butt. He was thoroughly humiliated as his younger friends destroyed his butt.

The waistband was halfway up his back and jammed into his front, creaking from the strain of the front and back wedgie “Alright let’s get to work on these!” Tai says excited as Matt nods with a grin, causing joe to whimper again. He knew a lot of wedgies (he had a younger brother after all), and Matt knew exactly what to do.

“Hey Tai? Ever heard of a squeaky clean?” Joe felt dread wash over him as he began begging not to get one. That just seemed to peek Tai’s interest, as he had never heard of that type before, “Or we could do a classic hanging wedgie.... What sounds more interesting to you Tai?”

122112221.content:
Yolei sighed as she stretched, looking at her surroundings. Things were a mess around here nowadays, even with that problem with Ken as the Digimon Emperor getting cleared up. The digital world was just totally wrecked and they had to fix it as best they could with the digimon’s help.

It didn't help she had been partnered with Davis. Oh yes, she worked with the boy often enough- they were friends and fellow digi-destined. Yet his knack for annoying the crap out of people was legendary. He was loud and charged into things headfirst. But what to do…

“Wow, I think a found a cave down here! We gotta get in there and check it out! Dunno if I can fit though…” She glanced over at the oblivious boy and caught sight of a waistband as he was bent over, looking at something in a tunnel in the ground. He was on all fours, butt in the air. Oh that would just be perfect!

In a couple strides she was over there and she swiftly booted him in the backside, shoving his body into the hole as much as she could, “HEY-MPH!” Davis’s voice was muffled as his upper torso and head was caught in the hole in the ground. His legs kicked futilely as he tried to escape his predicament.

Yolei cracked her knuckles in anticipation and smirked evilly, “Time to work out some frustration!” She reached into his pants as he kicked harder, realizing what was coming. She paused for a moment to let him freak out, listening to his muffled frantic pleas for forgiveness. Then she yanked as hard as she could, rocketing his waistband into the air.

“MMMMMMMPH!!!” He cried out as the white cotton of his briefs was shoved up his butt as hard as Yolei could muster. Which for a kid who rarely received wedgies (leadership had its perks) was plenty high enough. Yolei laughed as she watched him, fists full of white briefs as she held it high above him; occasionally she would pull a little on the waistband when he slowed his kicking, content to watch his flailing about.

Eventually, a good ten minutes later, Davis began to get used to her pulls, butt aching from the constant wedgie. His feet couldn't touch the ground to relieve the now constant pain and Yolei seemed to have no plans for stopping. She looked down at him, head in the ground and began to think….. Should she pull him out before continuing to torture him or not? There was a chance he could turn on her but she was sure she could handle him.

While he was jammed in the hole, helpless against Yolei's wedgie onslaught, he had some time to think to himself.

He had to give Yolei credit, the girl had quite a bit of muscle on her, given how strong the force of her pulling felt, so much so that it lifted his butt and legs into the air without difficulty. For some odd reason though, there was a tingling sensation going up his spine to go with the pain in his rump as he felt her throw in some bounces for good measure. Something about this tingling felt strange.. Almost as if..

Am.. Am I liking this?! The boy mentally asked himself in slight horror. Th-that can't be right! Wedgies are supposed to be something that hurt! But, the way she's pulling on them.. It... Oh lord..

--

Eventually, Yolei made her choice.

She breathed in and out, releasing Davis's underwear, all the while keeping his butt and legs in the air as she changed her grip from his waistband to the seat of his pants.

Rather than pulling the pants up his crack, Yolei was now, pulling them towards herself, intent on getting Davis out of the hole and continuing to wedgie the boy silly.

While she was pulling him out by his pants, Yolei had gotten a good luck at his rump while it still had his tightly whities up his crack.

Gotta admit, Davis has a pretty nice butt... Must be from playing soccer so much.. Yolei thought to herself, as she felt her nose bleeding, though she eventually shook herself out of her thoughts. Get a hold of yourself girl, focus!

She took a step backwards. And with a mighty heave, she successfully pulled Davis out of the hole, managing to keep a solid footing to prevent herself from falling on her back as she released Davis's pants.

Davis groaned a bit as he landed flat on his belly, a bit disoriented. Before he could reach a hand to pluck his underwear out of his crack, Yolei had quickly reached her hands in, once again grabbing him by the waistband of his tightly whities, once again giving him a solid wedgie as she lifted him right off the ground rather easily.

"Hope you like the taste of cotton Goggle-boy, because that's all you're gonna be tasting by the time I'm done with you!" Yolei exclaimed to her victim.

122112221111.content:
Before Davis could protest, Yolei tightened her grip on his briefs. And without even skipping a beat, she immediately started bouncing him about by his underwear.

Davis yelped, and squealed as she did so, the fabric cutting deep into him, and with him not having any means of escape, thanks to both the speed of the bouncing wedgie and the fact that she kept him off the forest floor without difficulty. The boy didn't even have time to process how strong the taller girl was, due to how fast the bouncing was.

"Y-Yolei please, leggo!"

"Fat chance!" Yolei replied to Davis, "You're getting what's coming to you whether you like it or not!"

Yolei stopped bouncing of course, but she still didn't take it easy on her victim, as she pulled on the boy's underwear every which way. This of course caused him to squeal in discomfort, helpless as Yolei used his own underpants against him.

O-oh my god.. Davis thought to himself, as the tingling sensations came back to him.

Why didn't I do this before? This is beyond therapeutic! Yolei thought, with a grin forming itself on her face, and a second nosebleed starting as she looked at Davis's thoroughly wedgied booty; Plus, I got a pretty good view from back h-FOCUS DAMMIT!

The more she tugged, the more the tingling sensations spread throughout Davis's body.

Eventually after a few more minutes of the wedgie onslaught, Davis couldn't fight the urge, as his squealing turned into soft moaning. Yolei stopped in mid pull, surprised at the noise that he was making. Davis immediately covered his mouth, his cheeks blushing heavily in embarrassment.

Yolei stood there in silence, still processing what had just happened. And unfortunately for her victim, he was now having thoughts running through his head.. Thoughts such as: "I wanna crawl in a hole and die" or "Please let this just be a nightmare" and of course, "Someone please end me right now!"

The purple haired girl decided to break the ice, slowly moving her head towards Davis while still holding him aloft by his underwear. She put her lips next Davis's left ear, and whispered to him some words he did not plan on hearing today..

"Davis..... Did you just...........Moan?"

Davis's voice, for a moment, died.. Then it came back to life as he stammered to her, "I'm s-s-so sorry! I don't know what came over me! I.. I didn't mean to! I..... Oh god, I'm such a weirdo!"

Yolei slowly lowered Davis down until his feet were touching the ground, releasing her grip on Davis's undies as they snapped against his lower back. She then immediately turned the shorter boy around, and placed an arm around his shoulders in an effort to comfort him.

"Davis..... You don't have anything to be ashamed of.... We both didn't know that would happen.. I.." Yolei's mind raced to find something appropriate to say, "I got carried away and.. Well, I don't think any less of you for what just happened, okay?.. Maybe you can get on my nerves at times, but I know you're not a bad guy."

"B-but, I.. Wedgies aren't supposed to make me react like that! Th-they're supposed to hurt! I.. I don't wanna be a freak!"

"Davis, really, it's okay.. If it makes you feel any better, let's just not mention this to the others, or anyone else for that matter. That sound good?"

Davis gave her a slow nod, his entire face at this point was now resembling a tomato in color.

Obviously she hadn’t given many, but even the ones she had given weren’t like this one. This was just fun in a different way. Plus it didn’t hurt that she got a view of Davis's wedgied butt each time she did it. And dammit, it was a nice view!

She wouldn’t normally do it a lot to any one person, but he obviously LIKED it despite the fact he wasn’t sure how to feel about it yet. And like she thought before, it was incredibly fun! She had fun giving the kid wedgies and he was just starting to enjoy them. A perfect win win scenario for the two of them. She just needed to convince him of the same.

Davis meanwhile was dying of embarrassment. He was one of the leaders of the digi-destined, and here he was enjoying a wedgie of all things?! Yolei was being nice and hadn’t made fun of him or said she’d spread rumors, or god forbid blackmail him! But still, what she must think of him after that!

He really had enjoyed it, which was the problem. Davis knew what wedgies were supposed to feel like- heck they started off hurting today too! Now though he obviously enjoyed them and he was unsure about what to do.

Yolei turned to him as they walked, intent on having a heart to heart conversation. “Davis, about today. I think we can both be honest here and say you liked what… happened. Not to be blunt, but… I kind of did too.”

He whistled to himself, his hands in his pockets casually as he was skipping a bit in his steps.

Yolei put a hand to her mouth as she gave out some muffled giggling as she watched him.

She honestly had to admit, as strange as yesterday was, she was somewhat glad it happened. She was starting to look past his tendency to be annoying and seeing what was beneath it.

Davis had a certain boyish charm to him that made him pretty likable and magnetic.. It especially helped that he was acting so adorably dorky with the way he was skipping.

She exhibited a certain glow and confidence to her that made her so outgoing, it.. It was honestly making him feel like butterflys were in his stomach.

Eventually after getting to the spot, Yolei looked at him, "Oh, just wanted to let you know about something Davis.. I've taken the liberty of buying some extra pair of undies for you, just in case the pair you're wearing tears off or something.. They're in my backpack, in case you're wondering." "Any time!" Yolei soon released her hold on Davis while also taking off the backpack. "Anyway, I've tested your undies out.. They should last for a little while.. So what do you say we get started?"

122112221111111111111.content:
Despite how durable the briefs, they were ultimately no match for Yolei's hidden strength.

The seams slowly but surely started to pop, until tearing sounds could be heard. Yolei heard them, but was too late to stop herself as the briefs tore off in her hand.

Davis went tumbling until he landed face first in he dirt, his rear sticking in the air.

"S-sorry about that!" Yolei said as she quickly ran to him, and helped him up."I still got another pair of briefs for you though.."

"Thanks.." Davis said as he rubbed his butt, to help with the pain.

Yolei then went over to her backpack and reached in, pulling out a pair of briefs, with a large printed image of Doraemon on the front and back.

Davis chuckled, gratefully taking the briefs, thanking her as he went behind some bushes..

As soon as he got the tattered remains of the briefs off, he slipped into his new briefs, as well as his pants.. Just as he was about to tell Yolei he was ready, however.. His back felt something solid.

It definitely wasn't a rock or a tree..

He gulped as he slowly looked up at the grinninng face of a DarkTyrranomon..

"Well now.. Fresh meat~" The digimon said with a deep yet feminine voice, confirming it was female.
122112221111111111111.title: The briefs break and Davis goes flying!

choices: She takes off with Davis! (Yolei doesn't save him)
She takes off with Yolei in hot pursuit!
1221122211111111111111.content:
Davis whimpered and immediately started running as fast as he could- Or he would've if the Digimon hadn't immediately snaked her talon into his briefs, yanking him back and into the air.

Davis squealed in terror as he flew up in the air, his briefs flying up into his butt, flying back in forth in the air, the cotton grinding into his cotch then back into his butt, then side to side-!

Eventually the digimon stopped, chuckling as he hung dazed from her grasp, "Let's have some more fun!"
1221122211111111111111.title: The digimon wedgies Davis

12211222111111111111112.content:
Yolei was doing some warm up stretches to get ready to continue her wedgie session with Davis, when she heard the sound of heavy footsteps, and a familiar voice squealing loudly in pain.

Yolei turned her head to see Davis, being carried off by his briefs, courtesy of a huge black digimon looking like a t-Rex holding him in its talon.

"DAVIS!" Yolei ran off towards where the two were going while reaching for her D3; "Hold on buddy, I'm coming!"
12211222111111111111112.title: She takes off with Yolei in hot pursuit!

choices: Yolei escapes the boulder and finds some unexpected help!
122112221111111111111121.content:
Davis squealed as he was carried by the black dinosaur-like digimon in her talons.

Somehow, she was careful enough to avoid puncturing the briefs with them, as well as to exercise enough restraint in her physical strength so that she wouldn't rip them as she held him in her clutches.

But that didn't compare to the embarrassment that poor Davis was feeling, hoping that no one (other than Yolei that is) would see him like this.

Speaking of which, despite how high up he was, he was able to recognize her as she chased after the DarkTyrannomon.. Without her partner, Hawkmon or even Veemon no less.

The dinosaur digimon, however saw the glasses wearing chosen child out of the corner of her eye as she ran, snorting in annoyance, but nonetheless impressed by her commitment. Either the lavender haired girl had ovaries of steel, or she was crazy..

Likely a combination of both.

But she'd take care of that soon enough, she mused.

And she would do it, by whacking a boulder six feet in diameter at Yolei with a single swipe of her tail.

"Crapcrapcrapcrapcrap!" Yolei exclaimed as she saw the oncoming boulder rolling at a considerable speed towards her.
122112221111111111111121.title: Meanwhile, with Davis..

choices: Yolei doesn't need Ken (leaves him in a hanging wedgie)
Yolei keeps Ken (wedgies him till he submits and agrees to help)
1221122211111111111111211.content:
Yolei dropped to the ground, flattening to the ground in an effort to survive. The boulder sailed over her head barely, crushing the trees behind here. She jumped up and tried to follow but tripped over a vine, falling down a hill.

She yelled and cried out as she hit the forest floor below, groaning as she laid there. "Y-Yolei???"

Yolei looked up to see Ken's face and she sighed in relief, "Ah Ken!" She pulled herself to her feet as Ken stepped back looking at her concerned, "You have to help me! DarkTyrannomon took Davis!"

Ken was a bit taken back by this, "Wait seriously? He's been kidnapped or abducted by that digimon? What do you think I can do?"

Yolei brushed passed him, "we gotta split up Ken and look around, and yell if we find Davis. It can't have taken him very far!"

Ken justs hook his head, "That's crazy, I didn't even hear a Dark Tyrannomon run by here just now- you're playing a joke on me aren't you?" He said annoyed.

Yolei turned around angering, "A joke?! Davis is in trouble!"

"So you've said multiple times."

Yolei stomped over and got in Ken's face. He was gonna regret pissing her off right now!
1221122211111111111111211.title: Yolei escapes the boulder and finds some unexpe...

choices: Let's check up on poor Davis, shall we?
12211222111111111111112112.content:
Ken had a sinking feeling that he made a misstep, if Yolei's face were anything to go by.

Before he could back away and escape her wrath however, he felt Yolei's gloved hands shoot into the front of Ken's pants.

What came out of Ken's mouth came a yelp of discomfort and surprise, as he felt his boxer briefs, shoot out.

"Y-Yolei, what are you-?!"

"Showing YOU why you shouldn't doubt me! Seriously, I have the Digi-egg of Sincerity! Why would I make something as serious as Davis being in trouble?!" Yolei gave another tug upwards, getting a squeak out of her unfortunate victim.

"W-wait! Maybe the reason I didn't hear is because of how far away I was!" Ken said in an attempt to reason with the girl.

"..... Fair enough.." Yolei said "But I still need your help finding Davis!"

"O-okay, just leggo of my waistband.." Ken said with a wince.

Yolei promptly did as he said, letting it snap back into Ken's pants.

After a bit more talking, the two took different paths, though both were in the same general direction where the DarkTyrannomon was last headed with the goggle-headed boy.

Speaking of which..
12211222111111111111112112.title: Yolei keeps Ken (wedgies him till he submits an...

choices: DT smells Ken approaching; there's time for one last wedgie for Davis
Davis's underwear breaks and a new torture begins.
122112221111111111111121121.content:
Davis moaned loudly , hanging upside down as his white briefs tore into him. The digimon had ended up taking him to some sort of cave that served as her home for now it seemed. He had gotten nervous when he had seen the remains of old waistbands and recalled a story TK told of his older brother Matt being wedgied by a DarkTyrannomon and TK himself almost joining him.

"It's not often I get playthings- you usually have protectors to keep you safe," the digimon grinned evilly, holding Davis up by his cotton, the briefs lodged deep and firmly in his butt, "But you'll do nicely, the last boy didn't have very stretchy undies, had to end these wedgies too soon," and with that Davis felt terrified. This was not good.

One of her claws grabbed Davis's feet as the other kept a firm hold of his waistband,. After a moment, suspended in a panic, it started. DT began pulling on his legs, stretching out his undies more and more as they invaded his butt in ways he didn't think possible. He cried out as the waistband was dragged past his head before yelping as a sudden pull brought them down over his face and in his mouth.

He moaned and groaned, not sure whether to be loving or hating this Wedgie, still hung in the air by his legholes. She shifted him around, causing moans to leak from his lips as he fearfully waited for his next torture. He paused and Davis waited with baited breath.

Squealing he flipped over as his legholes were yanked and twisted, the DT making what was essentially a large rectangle with them as Davis landed upside down somehow, his legholes stretched to their brink and flossing his ass with abandon. As he hit the low point Davis moaned loudly as the cotton in his butt caught his weight, grinding into his butt.

As he hung dazed the DT laughed, "This is wonderful!"
122112221111111111111121121.title: Let's check up on poor Davis, shall we?

choices: The Digimon  turns Davis into a human tetherball!
1221122211111111111111211211.content:
In the time Davis had been a member of the Digidestined, he did various things.

Became Veemon's partner, gaining the Digi-eggs of Courage and Friendship, and freeing various digimon from Ken's control. Not to mention finding the Digi-egg of Miracles so that Veemon could armor digivolve into Magnamon in the battle with Kimeramon..

Receiving an uber wedgie from a twenty plus foot tall, champion level dinosaur-like digimon, via, hanging upside-down from her talons by his underpants (in a sort of twisted version of "Cat's cradle" no less) while also having his face covered by the stretchy material was NOT something that he wanted to be on his list of experiences as a Digidestined.

Thankfully, he had a moment of respite, however short it was, when DT paused in her laughing.

The sound of her nostrils taking a whiff of something echoed in the cave, leaving Davis to wonder what it was the bully of a dino was sniffing about.

DT looked to the side where she first caught the scent, sniffing a bit more.

She glowered a bit, but smiled. She then proceeded to undo the unusual wedgie that she put her captive in, even undoing the atomic wedgie that she had started Davis off with.

The goggle headed boy took a gasp of air, somewhat thankful that he could now breathe. But he would prefer that DT gently dropped him to the ground, and let him go his merry way, rather than being him aloft with a single talon under his waistband so that he was looking at his captor dead center in the face.

"Seems to me we got an unexpected guest coming soon. But luckily for me, it won't be for a while.. Leaving us plenty of time for me to try a trick or two.."

"Does it involve letting me go?" Davis asked meekly.

"I think we both know the answer here.."
1221122211111111111111211211.title: DT smells Ken approaching; there's time for...

choices: Meanwhile, Yolei gets more help while looking for Davis
12211222111111111111112112111.content:
DT grinned a fang filled smile as she went over to what appeared to be a stalagmite that came juuust a bit above her head.

She reached out the hand that dangled Davis in the air. And before the goggle wearing kid could protest, the waist band of his underwear was hooked over the very tip of the stalagmite, leaving him to dangle helplessly as he winced from as further discomfort was added to his already sore bum as he hung, his upperbody in a downwards position wiht his arms dangling at the sides.

He started to wiggle about as he lifted his legs up a bit, making his entire body now at a somewhat horizontal position, with his back arched and his rear raised a little as a result.

"You stop that.. I think we already established that you're not getting away.." DT jokingly scolded Davis as she put an index talon (thankfully not hte sharp tip of it) under his chin and raised it so that he was looking at her dead in the eye. The somewhat feminine giggling from the dino was a bit jarring to say the least, or at least it was for Davis at the time.

Suddenly, with just a light push from her left hand, Davis found himself being sent counter-clockwise around the stalagmite while still hanging by his underpants, squealing as the torque from the spinning now had what could only be described as an effect similar to a propeller wedgie.

In a sense, he was now getting what could be described as a "Hanging Twister Wedgie".

Before he could go all the way around, DT stopped him with the palm of her right hand. It was a good thing for Davis that she had control over her strength to a degree, or otherwise she could have either sent him flying a considerable distance or even gotten a bone or two broken from just smacking into her hand.

"Don't thank me just yet, runt!" The digimon used that same hand of hers to push him back, now causing him to spin clockwise for a bit.

Great, now he was feeling dizzy.. And him without a barf-bag.

He could only hope someone found him. Yolei, Veemon, just SOMEONE to get him free as he was subjected to the bully of a dinosaur's torment while she laughed.
12211222111111111111112112111.title: The Digimon  turns Davis into a human tetherball!

info.brief_description: Give the boys from Digimon wedgies!
info.description:
Okay, here's the rules..

1.) If you want to add to the story, do so with comprehensive grammar and plenty of description.

2.) Girls are allowed to give wedgies, but they should not be on the receiving end.

3.) Focus on wedgies.

4.) Please keep the content at a PG-13 level. I cannot emphasize this enough!

5.) DON'T PLAGERIZE

6.) Keep the focus on the Digidestined

All and all, be creative and have fun!
